verses.name: 1 Samuel 19:11
verses.text: Saul also sent messengers unto David’s house, to watch him, and to slay him in the morning: and Michal David’s wife told him, saying, If thou save not thy life to night, to morrow thou shalt be slain.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 19:12
verses.text: So Michal let David down through a window: and he went, and fled, and escaped.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 19:13
verses.text: And Michal took an image, and laid it in the bed, and put a pillow of goats’ hair for his bolster, and covered it with a cloth.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 19:14
verses.text: And when Saul sent messengers to take David, she said, He is sick.
